channel.title: Need hoster and coder! (first 20 players will get staff!)
channel.description:
hello guys, as you know i need any hoster and coder for my server, the reward to them who do it for me will be owner on my server "Runeshy" 55+ players, and i need staff. so first 10 players will get admin, and next 10 players will get mod! so here it is just to be fast to reply :D (will add some pictures on next post! (this is my first post, plz give rep+ :) ) will make a post by my server with all online players next week ;D
forum: www.gay.smffy.com webclient: http://gay.tk/client43594.php this is the old client mediafire download:http://www.mediafire.com/?5nkgay3ioyp9i7p
the server is temp running by Hamachi! hamachi networks id: Runeshyclient password: Runeshy server Ip: 1.su.ck server ip wish:lolllse No-ip just anyone who can fix something, but not hamachi :)
Runeshy ServerStatus: ONLINE 24/7 when i get a hoster :) (be my hoster to Play) Runeshy ServerStatus: OFFLINE 1l - when i get a hoster :) (be my hoster - get owner)
[shadow=red,left]-Nox/neroxx[/shadow]
